title: Potions
content: n of Angelic Reprieve Drink to fall into slumber for 2 turns. Unless interrupted, gain the benefits of a Short Rest and regain all 1st and 2nd Level spell slots. The motion of the shimmering liquid going back and forth in its vial is somnambulant - you know drinking it will bring the comfort of a warm, enveloping blanket. Potion of Angelic Slumber Drink to fall into a 2-turn slumber. Unless interrupted, you gain the benefits of a Long Rest. One of the few ways for elves to experience sleep. Othe
